manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page STEP 1: Treat with OLAPLEX No. 3 Hair Perfector STEP 2: Cleanse with OLAPLEX No. 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo STEP 3: Follow with OLAPLEX No. 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner Next page 1 Treat 2 Cleanse 3 Condition

Olaplex No.4 A Highly Moisturizing and Reparative Shampoo Leaves hair easy to manage, shiny, and healthier with each use. Key Benefits: Repairs and maintains bonds within the hairEliminates frizz and flyawaysReduces breakage

How much Olaplex No. 4 should you use per wash? We recommend starting with a pea sized amount, adding more as needed for the length and thickness of your hair. Is Olaplex No. 4 safe on all hair types? Olaplex is for all hair textures and hair types whether chemically treated or not. How often can you use Olaplex No. 4? Olaplex No. 4 is formulated for daily or every wash use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best shampoo I have ever used.
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this shampoo and I’ve been using it going on three years now. I have used many of the all Plex products. I love the shampoo because it makes my hair feel super soft, very healthy, I have bleach blonde hair and it has done wonders for breakage and repair. I will continue to use this shampoo and it is very reasonable and a great price point. I also love how thick and consistency the shampoo is and a little goes a long way. I have long thick hair and I can use this product for about two months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After a long time of hearing about this product, I finally gave in during the Prime Days of sale. Wow! Just wow! My hair which is very thin and not as much of it, looks lush after this shampoo! It feels soft but with substance. It takes just a dime size of the product to get a ton of lather, so this small bottle will last a long time! The conditioner is light, it glides effortlessly on my highlighted hair. I am a huge fan, instantly! it could smell nicer, but who cares when it works so well!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I’m about to take you for a little ride so if you’re not up for it, TL/DR; just buy it. It’s great.I have about waist length, very straight, unprocessed, fine, but very dense (think a scoop of angel hair vs the same scoop of regular spaghetti), brown hair. It’s always been relatively healthy and routinely trimmed. I wash and condition about once a week unless I get sweaty/dirty. I only blow dry when it’s washed/wet, but I do flat iron daily to smooth out any kinks from sleeping on it. BUT I started taking Accutane (rx for acne) about 6 months ago and it has completely destroyed my mane. It’s insanely dry, breaking, and looks like I have paint in my hair because there are so many split ends. I’m a bit of a product whore, but not out of control. I’ve typically used redkin, biolage, aveda, and similar products. It was hard for me to swallow paying $30 for EIGHT OUNCES. But, it came highly recommended by both my derm and other Accutane users, so I took the plunge. I got the shampoo, conditioner, and oil. Amazon mistakenly forgot my conditioner so I can’t comment on it quite yet, but I’m going to go out on a limb and assume it’s as great as the oil and shampoo. I can’t tell you, honestly, the last time I fully washed my hair with shampoo before tonight. I was a little over zealous with my portions… a little goes a long way with this shampoo. I went for a quarter sized, but probably only needed a dime. This stuff lathers like the silkiest, thickest, richest butter you’ve ever felt. It smells really good; light, clean, not floral or fruity, very neutral scent. The oil is exactly the same. I’m not sure if it really made a difference after one use or not, but I definitely think it will with repeated use. It’s a little pricey, but feels SO worth it. I’d like to tell you that I’ll update this review after a couple of weeks, but I will most definitely forget so you’re going to have to accept my first impression. If you’re on the fence, jump! I doubt you’ll regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Hair Product!
reviews.reviewText: I've been an Olaplex user for years. The shampoo is gentle enough and does not dry out my hair. It's very condensed, so a little bit goes a long way. A pea sized amount is enough for my mid length hair, and one bottle lasts me about 5 months shampooing every other day. I do like a lot of scent in my shampoo and conditioner, which this does not have, however less perfumes are probably better for my hair so I'm ok with that. I bought the shampoo and conditioner on a sale and signed up for autoshipping every few months to lock in a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is a game changer! I've been using it for over a year and it has completely transformed my hair. It repairs split ends and adds great shine and manageability . Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Hair Care!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently tried the Olaplex No. 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo, and I must say it has completely transformed my hair care routine. As someone with color-treated and chemically processed hair, finding the right shampoo that not only cleanses but also nourishes and repairs is crucial. Olaplex No. 4 did not disappoint!Firstly, the scent is delightful and not overpowering. The shampoo lathers well, providing a luxurious and pampering experience in the shower. It leaves my hair feeling clean without that stripped or dry sensation that some shampoos can cause.The real magic, however, happens after the wash. I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall health of my hair since incorporating this product into my routine. My hair feels softer, stronger, and remarkably more manageable. The Olaplex formula truly lives up to its promise of repairing and maintaining hair bonds.Another standout feature is its color-preserving properties. Having invested time and money into my hair color, I'm thrilled to see that this shampoo helps extend the vibrancy of my color-treated hair, making salon visits less frequent.While the price may be a bit higher compared to other shampoos on the market, the results are worth every penny. A little goes a long way, so the bottle lasts a decent amount of time, making it a cost-effective investment in the long run.In conclusion, if you're looking for a shampoo that not only cleanses your hair but also repairs and maintains its health, Olaplex No. 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo is a game-changer. It's become a staple in my hair care routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking to elevate their hair care experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, edit added
reviews.reviewText: I've used Redkin for 6months and tho it did improve my frizzy hair, it didn't really fix it. No4 definitely made my hair look better after 2 weeks. I feel it'll only get better from here. I don't have to use as much conditioner and I could do without the oil, as well.I find it hilarious that they listed this product requiring batteries.Edit: 3rd week: my scalp is on fire. I don't wash my hair daily. It started with an itch, then skin peeling at the first wash of the week. Sometimes I get dandruff flare-ups so this isn't new. But then my second wash of the week, began the burning. Back to redkin. I really wanted this to work!
I love this product as well as its companion conditioner. Very nice!
Muy bueno deja el cabello suave y manejable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Good product for all hair types
reviews.reviewText: Hair feels stronger after just one use also improve with subsequent use. I use one or twice a week. Very thick a little goes a long way bottle lasts a long time. Good value for a premium product..
Damn expensive but an amazing product .
いいいいいいいいいい my hair feels healthier
